name: @mcp-world/network-sandbox
description: MCP Network Sandbox - Interactive expert network for demo

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/data', {recursive: true})" && node -e "require('fs').readdirSync('src/data').forEach(f => require('fs').copyFileSync('src/data/' + f, 'dist/data/' + f))"

author: Justin Strackany
